description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Waya Island, Fiji. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Fiji Waya Island Adults-Only Resort with All-Inclusive Dining
hotels.description: Discover the Fiji of your dreams: framed by volcanic hinterland, lush jungle and the endlessly shimmering Pacific Ocean, this boutique resort is an adults-only oasis in an exceptionally intimate and unspoiled sanctuary. Waya Island Resort champions home-style Fijian cooking, with produce grown from island gardens or plucked fresh from the seas. Enjoy a guided visit to the charming Yalobi Village, embark on a hand-line fishing expedition - and relax at the spa as the resort’s chefs prepare your catch that very evening - or seek out vast underwater worlds with the assistance of the resort’s expert guides.
